Title: Human oral bioavailability prediction
Description: HobPre predicts the oral bioavailability of small molecules in humans. It has been trained using public data on ~1200 molecules (Falcón-Cano et al, 2020, complemented with other literature and ChEMBL compounds). The molecules were labeled according to two cut-offs: HOB > 20% and HOB > 50%, due to ongoing discussions as to which would be a more appropriate cut-off.
Interpretation: Probability of a compound having high oral bioavailability (HOB >20% and HOB >50%)
